oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Original wills, Avrit, Mary A., 1904 April 04
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An original will of Mary A. Avrit, dated January 7th, 1902. Illustrates the first page of the document. Avrit’s will was presented for probate to the Davidson County Court on April 4th, 1904. Forms part of Record Group 16, Original Wills, 1780-1925.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Avrit family
